title: Remove SentinelAI branding and update frontend assets/copy to Nexus Forge AI

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing “SentinelAI” UI copy with “Nexus Forge AI” across all rendered sections and attributes (alt/aria/etc.).
acceptanceCriteria: Visually scanning the site (all sections in `frontend/src/App.tsx`) shows zero instances of the string “SentinelAI”.
A case-insensitive search for “SentinelAI” across `frontend/src` returns no matches in user-facing content, including `alt` attributes and `aria-label` values.
The brand name displayed in the header and footer reads “Nexus Forge AI”.

file_operations.description: Update header brand text and all user-facing attributes to “Nexus Forge AI” (including aria-label and img alt text) and remove any remaining “SentinelAI” strings.
Update footer brand text/copyright and any visible helper text to “Nexus Forge AI”, removing all “SentinelAI” occurrences (including any email link display text).
Replace the hero marketing paragraph copy so it no longer mentions “SentinelAI” and instead references “Nexus Forge AI”, ensuring headings/paragraphs/CTAs contain no “SentinelAI”.
Update Assistant section descriptive text so it does not mention “SentinelAI” and uses “Nexus Forge AI” branding while preserving existing health gating, error handling, and submission behavior.
Replace all FAQ questions/answers and section intro text that mention “SentinelAI” with “Nexus Forge AI”, ensuring no user-visible “SentinelAI” remains.
Update Use Cases section paragraphs/CTAs so they refer to “Nexus Forge AI” and contain no “SentinelAI”.
Update Contact section headings/paragraphs/success helper copy so there is no visible “SentinelAI” anywhere while keeping the contact flow intact.
Audit and update any user-facing text to ensure no “SentinelAI” appears anywhere in the demo section rendered by App.
Audit and update any user-facing text to ensure no “SentinelAI” appears in the capabilities section rendered by App.
Audit and update any user-facing text to ensure no “SentinelAI” appears in the how-it-works section rendered by App.
Audit and update any user-facing text to ensure no “SentinelAI” appears in the safety & security section rendered by App.
Search and replace any user-facing content strings that mention “SentinelAI” so rendered capability cards contain no “SentinelAI”.
Search and replace any user-facing content strings that mention “SentinelAI” so rendered workflow content contains no “SentinelAI”.
Search and replace any user-facing content strings that mention “SentinelAI” so rendered demo prompt content contains no “SentinelAI”.

requirements.summary: Remove SentinelAI-named static asset references (logos/hero background) and ensure the UI references only valid, non-Sentinel filenames with no 404s.
acceptanceCriteria: No `` tags or CSS `backgroundImage` URLs in rendered pages reference filenames containing `sentinelai`.
All images referenced by the UI return HTTP 200 (no 404s) after deployment.
The site favicon and social images remain valid and render correctly.

file_operations.description: Update header logo image sources to use `frontend/public/assets/generated/nexusforgeai-logo-light.dim_512x512.png` and `frontend/public/assets/generated/nexusforgeai-logo-dark.dim_512x512.png` (no references to sentinelai-named files).

Update footer logo image sources to use `frontend/public/assets/generated/nexusforgeai-logo-light.dim_512x512.png` and `frontend/public/assets/generated/nexusforgeai-logo-dark.dim_512x512.png` (no references to sentinelai-named files).

Remove or replace the hero background image reference to `frontend/public/assets/generated/sentinelai-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png` so no CSS background uses a sentinelai-named file; use a non-asset background treatment instead (e.g., Tailwind gradient/background classes) to avoid 404s.
Remove the SentinelAI-named generated asset to prevent accidental future references; ensure the UI uses only the nexusforgeai logo assets.
Remove the SentinelAI-named generated asset to prevent accidental future references; ensure the UI uses only the nexusforgeai logo assets.
Remove the SentinelAI-named hero background asset after hero is updated to no longer reference it, ensuring there are no remaining sentinelai asset references.
Remove the SentinelAI-named capability icons asset if present/unused to ensure no sentinelai-named assets are referenced or shipped inadvertently.
Verify favicon and social meta images remain valid and continue referencing `frontend/public/assets/generated/nexusforgeai-logo-light.dim_512x512.png` (no sentinelai-named assets).

requirements.summary: Update Contact section mailto content and visible email presentation to remove all “SentinelAI” text while keeping the existing mailto destination behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section contains no visible “SentinelAI” text, including in success messages and helper paragraphs.
Submitting the contact form still opens the user’s email client via `mailto:` and includes a sensible subject/body that uses “Nexus Forge AI” branding.
The mailto destination remains functional and unchanged unless explicitly updated by the user.

file_operations.description: Keep the `mailto:` destination pointing to the existing address (currently `mailto:SentinelAI@usa.com`) but remove all visible “SentinelAI” strings: update the email subject to “Nexus Forge AI …”, adjust any prefilled body branding, and change displayed email text/success helper text so it does not render “SentinelAI” anywhere (including link text).
Update the visible email address text in the footer so it does not display “SentinelAI” while keeping the underlying `mailto:` destination unchanged unless explicitly changed by the user.
